channel.title: A RuneScape community i've been working on
channel.description:
So i started yesterday, and i feel like this is my best work so far.
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/df4c787e6d3bca59ceec2e848a321d10.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/062e64919d74d3302759f11d8c1ca152.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/f6f70ca9ad8870837ec5ed88c5c4c965.png[/img] [size=24pt]More coming soon. [/size]
[b]I'd like some feedback on the design. Thank you![/b]
[url=http://aggroth.com/]Demo[/url]

item.title: A RuneScape community i've been working on
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“tickle me elmo, post:13, topic:550101”]>lmao terrible -10/10 for design

wow so edgy, “we will rule RuneScape one day"
nice font choices, looks like u designed this with the intent to make it illegible
”<!doctype PHP>"
wraps bold tags everywhere even around meta tags

“i feel like this is my best work so far.”

[/quote]This post dough

Ruby:

I tried to correct this kid once and he went on a vendetta for like 3 weeks of posting after every post I made on every thread calling me an asshole. Was kinda funny.

The way you talk to people is sometimes rough, so I can understand. You did say “kid” though.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @justaguy justaguy
item.description:
@justaguy wrote:

Personally I think the template is kind of ugly; the font on the feedback page is awful. I wasn’t going to post but you clearly have a poor attitude when it comes to taking criticisms.

Read full topic
item.source: A RuneScape community i've been working on

item.title: A RuneScape community i've been working on
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

[quote=“Coldmedicine, post:3, topic:550101”]What do you mean with organising?
It’s perfectly organised.[/quote]

That makes you sound cocky. It is not perfectly organized by any means. Everything is centered on the site except the navigation bar and logo, the content box is WAYYY to wide, and the background doesn’t match at all. 4/10 on organization. 1/10 on your humbleness.

Read full topic
item.source: A RuneScape community i've been working on

item.title: A RuneScape community i've been working on
item.dc:creator: @Coldmedicine Coldmedicine
item.description:
@Coldmedicine wrote:

[quote=“naseem142, post:4, topic:550101”][quote author=Coldmedicine link=topic=669013.msg4473806#msg4473806 date=1424600342]
What do you mean with organising?
It’s perfectly organised.
Also, i didn’t quit web development, i quit RSPS.
[/quote]

I see…

I meant the font is horrible, and the button does not fit with the website theme. I don’t know… just doesn’t feel right[/quote]I disagree.

Read full topic

item.title: A RuneScape community i've been working on
item.dc:creator: @naseem142 naseem142
item.description:
@naseem142 wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:7, topic:550101”][quote author=naseem142 link=topic=669013.msg4473810#msg4473810 date=1424603151]

What do you mean with organising?
It’s perfectly organised.
Also, i didn’t quit web development, i quit RSPS.

I see…

I meant the font is horrible, and the button does not fit with the website theme. I don’t know… just doesn’t feel right
[/quote]None of the things you have mentioned have anything to do with organization.[/quote]

Then I’m sorry I used the wrong word, I meant style or graphics.

Read full topic
